title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\CloneContext
name: CloneContext
description:
Database instance clone context.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.CloneContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.destination_instance_name
params.description: Name of the Cloud SQL instance to be created as a clone.

params.name: data.bin_log_coordinates
params.description: Binary log coordinates, if specified, identify the position up to which the source instance is cloned. If not specified, the source instance is cloned up to the most recent binary log coordinates.

params.name: data.point_in_time
params.description: Timestamp, if specified, identifies the time to which the source instance is cloned.

params.name: data.allocated_ip_range
params.description: The name of the allocated ip range for the private ip CloudSQL instance. For example: "google-managed-services-default". If set, the cloned instance ip will be created in the allocated range. The range name must comply with RFC 1035. Specifically, the name must be 1-63 characters long and match the regular expression a-z?. Reserved for future use.

methods.description:

methods.name: getAllocatedIpRange
methods.description:
The name of the allocated ip range for the private ip CloudSQL instance.

For example: "google-managed-services-default". If set, the cloned instance ip will be created in the allocated range. The range name must comply with RFC 1035. Specifically, the name must be 1-63 characters long and match the regular expression a-z?. Reserved for future use.
